headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: the computer games that every Xmas stocking needs
text: This week on Tech Weekly with Aleks Krotoski, we look at the must-have games for those Xmas stockings. Aleks is joined by the Guardian's games correspondent Keith Stuart and by games writer and Ginx TV presenter Lucy James to discuss gaming gold in 2012 and look at trends in the games sector. Aleks is also joined by the Guardian Technology editor Charles Arthur to talk about the public spat between Hewlett-Packard and the British tech entrepreneur Dr Mike Lynch over the $7bn (4.4bn) spent on acquiring Lynch's company Autonomy. Charles and Aleks also discuss the latest IBM e-commerce figures around the sales frenzy in the UK commonly known as Black Friday.
